original_text: Even today, they still do things in the same way that they have always done them. They do not truly worship the Lord. They do not obey his rules, his laws or his teaching. They do not obey the commands that the Lord gave to the descendants of Jacob. Jacob was the man that the Lord gave a new name to. He gave him the name ‘Israel’.
korean_text: 그들이 오늘까지 이전 풍속대로 행하여 여호와를 경외하지 아니하며 또 여호와께서 이스라엘이라 이름을 주신 야곱의 자손에게 명령하신 율례와 법도와 율법과 계명을 준행하지 아니하는도다

sentences.original_text: they still do things in the same way
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 여전히 같은 방식으로 일을 합니다

sentences.original_text: that they have always done them
They do not truly worship the Lord
They do not obey his rules
They do not obey the commands
that the Lord gave to the descendants of Jacob
that the Lord gave a new name to
